text: 💡 Idee: Reduce energy consumption om milieu te beschermen! 🌍💡 Idea: Reducing energy consumption is a crucial step towards protecting the environment! 🌿💡 Tips: 1) Switch to energy-efficient appliances 💡, 2) Use natural light instead of artificial 💡, 3) Insulate your home properly 🏠, 4) Use public transport, carpool, or bike instead of driving alone 🚗, 5) Eat less meat 🥩, 6) Unplug devices when not in use 🔌.💡 Actie: Join the  challenge and share your tips with others! 🌱💡
